OPCDeviceID.value: (OPC UA Device ID from RIO EMU)

eventScripts.script:
import system
	import datetime
	minutes = datetime.datetime.now().minute
	seconds = datetime.datetime.now().second
	if minutes % 15 == 0 and seconds == 0:
		marker = system.tag.read("[.]Total_kWh_15min_marker").value
		newValue = system.tag.read("[.]../Total_NetApparentEnergy_kWh").value
		system.tag.write("[.]Total_kWh_Current_15min_Interval", newValue-marker)
		system.tag.write("[.]Total_kWh_15min_marker", newValue)

import system
	demand = system.tag.read("[.]Intervals/Total_VA_15min_Marker").value
	if currentValue.value > demand:
		system.tag.write("[.]Intervals/Total_VA_15min_Marker", currentValue.value)

import system
	import datetime
	minutes = datetime.datetime.now().minute
	seconds = datetime.datetime.now().second
	if minutes % 15 == 0 and seconds == 0:
		demand = system.tag.read("[.]Total_VA_15min_Marker").value
		system.tag.write("[.]Total_VA_15Min_Demand", demand)
		system.tag.write("[.]Total_VA_15Min_Marker", 0)
